extendedInfo.description: With over 50 million messages exchanged every week, SCRUFF is the dating and social networking app of choice for a community of more than 5 million gay, bi, and curious guys worldwide.SCRUFF has the most guys you are into: muscle guys, masculine jocks, bears, rugged outdoorsmen, college guys, military servicemen, geeks, and more.Download SCRUFF for FREE and start checking out guys immediately on the gay app with the most FREE features:- Exchange unlimited video, photo, and text messages on our fast, reliable network- View guys both near you and online worldwide- Search for guys by profile name and location- Flirt with guys you like by Woofing at them- Find guys later by adding them to your Favorites- Discover matches using âWould you meet?â rating- Reveal more by sharing and receiving private photo albums- Track who is interested in you by checking who has viewed and Woofâd you- Browse guys quickly by swiping between profilesSubscribe to SCRUFF Pro to unlock the most powerful social app for iOS. With SCRUFF Pro you can- Browse profiles anonymously by enabling Stealth- View up to 300 guys simultaneously in the Nearby grid- Find the guys you like with unlimited filters--age, ethnicity, height/weight, relationship status, and more- Play and archive videos and images - Access complete message histories and all prior conversations- Share and receive an unlimited number of private albums, with full access to all photos- Add up to 25,000 favorites, organized in up to 100 customizable folders- Unsend messages (in case you change your mind)- Disable ads, making room for more guys- See up to 100 guys in Viewers & Woofs- Add an extra layer of privacy by enabling a launch password- Add custom profile notes about guys you like- Let guys know you are on the go by enabling travel mode- Send your favorite photos and videos faster with Recent Images- Discover the list of guys who âWant to meet youâ...and much more!* * *For support, please visit http://www.scruff.com/support

reviews.title: 5 Star Excellence
reviews.comment: Great community, fantastic technical support. Easy to use layout.
reviews.author: Anthony Pitts

reviews.title: Fast stable and well thought out
reviews.comment: Notification system works. Doesn\'t lose chats like grinder and having separate Windows for chats, favorites and local it\'s way better.  Pro it a bit too expensive
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bollocks
reviews.comment: Won\'t except my e mail address says its in use, it is by me.
reviews.author: Kevin Johnson

reviews.title: Works well on galaxy s3
reviews.comment: I like the push notification I still wish I could set it to gps my location instead of typing in cities. But hot dads. Love it.
reviews.author: Dan Beede

reviews.comment: Lets meet, wait no not now, how about tomorrow? Wait , how about next week?  Other than just catfish profilers pushing fake stats and younger pictures, the application is user friendly\tIts average at best, but well designed app
reviews.author: John Holt

reviews.title: Definitely user friendly and amazing community. :D
reviews.comment: For anyone new to the gay dating scene its a great and easy way to dip your toes in.
reviews.author: Shane Peltzer

reviews.title: Just ok...
reviews.comment: Video messaging? Seriously? And now we have to stare at all the employee\'s faces? Narcissistic much? Wouldn\'t be bad if they were at least attractive lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Probably the best gay dating app out there for now. All the basics are free, but they seem to make one feature paid version only with every update. It may not be long before you have to pay to do more than look at thumbnails. And they should stop assuming all gay people will be interested in Obama propaganda.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible app
reviews.comment: It crashes in my Galaxy S3 before I can even create a profile
reviews.author: Damon Roberts

reviews.title: Better and Classier
reviews.comment: The guys in my area using SCRUFF seem more civil than the guys I\'ve seen on other apps, such as Grindr.
reviews.author: Scott Everson

reviews.title: Delivers on its intent - Samsung s4
reviews.comment: One of the best gay male apps, a little overwhelming to figure out the app at first, but once you get a handle on it you wicket realize how comprehensive and enjoyable the app is in terms of meeting men that are next door to half way around the world. In all this app delivers on its intent.
reviews.author: Michael Wipranik

reviews.title: Fantastic app for my kind of guys
reviews.comment: The best gay app available
reviews.author: Stephen Mc

reviews.comment: I\342\200\231d give this a higher rating save for the constant nagging to upgrade\342\200\246\tI really like this app; I\342\200\231ve had some great conversations and made some great friends using it. I\342\200\231d like to give it a higher rating, but I just can\'t tolerate the incessant badgering to upgrade to the pro version. I also don\342\200\231t like the bait-and-switch tactics the developer uses to make you think certain features are available, only to reveal that you have to subscribe to use them. The free app should only contain the features that are free\342\200\224I\342\200\231ll subscribe if and when I\342\200\231m ready to do so. I don\342\200\231t need the hard sell put on me every time I use this app.
reviews.author: Mikey Solominow

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I have tried a few other apps like this one and Scruff is by far the best!!
reviews.author: Tony Jones

reviews.title: Better Than The Competition!
reviews.comment: This app is significantly better than the competition and I have never had any problems with it\'s performance.
reviews.author: JasonGreenslopes

reviews.title: Usually very slow and constantly shutting down.
reviews.comment: Rarely able to view more than one profile before site freezes and shuts down . Due to this I use the site least of all .
reviews.author: Patrick Mark Daniel Hunter

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: So much better than grinder
reviews.author: Tony Cartwright

reviews.comment: One of the best apps
reviews.author: Philippe Larmaz

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Never fails, just wish there was more guys like on gdr
reviews.author: Nello Nello

reviews.comment: Great app, much better than Grindr and most of the other apps I\'ve seen.
